SEARCH
Package io.github.sahinemirhan.starter.annotation

Annotation Interface RiskCheck

@Target({METHOD,TYPE}) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Documented public @interface RiskCheck

  • Optional Element Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description

  • Element Details

    • action

      String action
      Optional action identifier to classify the invocation (e.g. LOGIN, READ, TRANSFER).
      Default:
      ""

    • userId

      String userId
      Default:
      ""

    • ip

      String ip
      Default:
      ""

    • attributes

      String[] attributes
      Default:
      {}

    • ruleProperties

      String[] ruleProperties
      Per-rule override entries, e.g. {"IP_VELOCITY.enabled=false", "USER_VELOCITY.maxPerWindow=15"}.
      Default:
      {}

    • evaluateBefore

      boolean evaluateBefore
      Evaluate risk rules before the annotated method executes. Keeps backward compatibility by defaulting to true. Automatically ignored when evaluateOnFailure() is enabled.
      Default:
      true

    • evaluateOnFailure

      boolean evaluateOnFailure
      Evaluate risk rules only when the annotated method throws an exception. Useful for login flows where failures should drive the counters.
      Default:
      false

    • evaluateAfterSuccess

      boolean evaluateAfterSuccess
      Evaluate risk rules after the annotated method completes successfully. Handy for actions that should influence counters on success (e.g. transfer, password change).
      Default:
      false
